content: My name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price was 525 Euros per month for the first three months, with a 50 Euro discount, effectively making the rent 475 Euros per month for the initial period. After the first three months, the rent would be reassessed for the remaining three months of the six-month lease.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as an 8.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Farhad Abbasi
